entries.name: new(io)
entries.desc: Creates a new TarReader on io and yields it to the block, if given.

entries.name: new(io)
entries.desc: Creates a new tar file reader on io which needs to respond to pos, eof?, read, getc and pos=

entries.name: each()
entries.desc: Iterates over files in the tarball yielding each entry

entries.name: rewind()
entries.desc: NOTE: Do not call rewind during each

entries.name: seek(name)
entries.desc: Seeks through the tar file until it finds the entry with name and yields it.  Rewinds the tar file to the beginning when the block terminates.
